TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormClosedEventHandler(object sender, FormClosedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormClosedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormClosedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormClosedEventArgs)
public delegate void FormClosedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormClosedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla un evento .

span.span: Represents the method that handles a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El evento se produce después de que se cierra un formulario, ya sea por el usuario, a través de la interfaz de usuario (UI), o mediante programación, a través de llamadas a métodos como en el (clase), o en la clase.The event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as in the class, or in the class. Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
